intro: Diellia brownii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Tanzania. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact rosette of velvety, waxy leaves. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically purple or violet in color. Diellia brownii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
